name: Retrospect Lu2019Extrait de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family: Warm & Spicy..Scent Type: Warm & Sheer..Key Notes: Bergamot, Jasmine, Musk..Fragrance Description: This long-lasting, clean fragrance opens with soft, bright notes of bergamot and pear, gently unfolding into a floral heart of jasmine, rose, and violet. Itu2019s balanced by a base of vanilla, musk, and moss, giving it a warm, second-skin finish that wears for up to over 12 hours...About the Bottle: Inspired by modernist jewelry, the custom glass bottle is designed to feel like an objet d'art that sits comfortably in the palm of your handu2014a nod to the tradition of fragrance as a timeless accessory...About the Fragrance: Inspired by old-world techniques and vintage notes, this concentrated extrait melts into the skin for a pure scent that endures all day. Developed in Paris, it balances elements of old and new, as well as softness and depth. Its complex blend is both familiar and intriguing, offering a fresh perspective on modern fragrances...Clean.Our commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing effectiveness.
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Fragrance (Parfum), Water, Butylmethoxydibenzoylmethane, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Benzyl Benzoate, Benzyl Salicylate, Cinnamal, Citral, Coumarin, Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool, Hexadecanolactone, Tetramethyl Acetyloctahydronaphthalenes, Trimethylbenzenepropanol, Jasmine Oil/Extract, Rose Ketones...The list of ingredients is subject to change. Please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:..- Spray onto your wrists, neck, and pulse points u2014 the natural warmth of your body will help diffuse the scent throughout the day. .- Avoid rubbing or dabbing your skin as this breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly....Clinical Results:  .Immediately after use:.96% agree this fragrance smells clean.86% agree this fragrance smells complex.83% agree this fragrance has a warm, second-skin finish..After 8 hours of wear: .93% agree this fragrance is still identifiable on my skin .90% agree this fragrance lasts

reviews.review_title: Goes from dry and bitter to green classy vintage.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Pricey! Glad I was able to save 20%. TY Sephora.   I personally like this fragrance. It gives sophistication, a mature  working woman, eluding confidence and grounded in her roots; one who dares to be different but still values tradition.   Initially, in my unboxing review, I described this as cosmetic smelling.  From the top note, it smells like an addictive lipstick that you have to smell every time you reapply. It also has a bitter, dry opening of vintage, fade mothball-like aroma, but not in a bad way, though. As it dries down an hour into wear, you can definitely smell subtle sweetness of cotton candy and violet. A slight green, pear skin scent is present. The vanilla is absent. The moss peeks through in the base notes along with subtle jasmine. I think this is where others are describing a hint of crayon smell mixed with cough syrup. To me, it smells purple, like violet.  My husband says it smells like a frosted evergreen ud83cudf32 and he approves. He isn't smelling mothballs, lipstick, or Crayola Crayons for the record. It's a very unique and interesting scent.   Clarins used to have a fragrance  about 20 years ago that this smells rather similar to it, but currently, there isn't anything like it.

reviews.review_text: If youu2019re a 90s kid you may understand. It smells like a new Barbie? Or plastic toys. Nostalgic like walking into Claireu2019s. I guess what Iu2019m trying to say is that this perfume smells synthetic. The bottle is pretty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm generally not a vanilla girlie. It's usually too sweet, too cloying. The opening pear note is wonderful for a hit of freshness. Because it's a l'extrait the longevity is good. If you're after a 'beast mode' perfume though where everyone knows you've been there before you leave, this isn't for you. The sillage is very close so only those who give you a hug or stand next to you are gonna smell it - but you will likely get a compliment about how good it smells!

reviews.review_title: At first, not a believer, but now a lover
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I read the reviews, I saw the notes, and it really called to me. Especially the dry down notes. I bought on a whim, and at first ...not my cup of tea, but as I smelled myself after an hour, I loved the lasting notes on my skin. It was a warm, grassy scent that I loved. But the beginning notes were just not it. As I've worn it through the week, it's grown on me. People have hugged me or passed by me and immediately wanted to know what I was wearing. I haven't had this much interaction with a fragrance since I was buying Lush perfume. To the naysayers, just give it a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Sampled this in Sephora. At first spray, I was in love. Even that evening it was amazing. My husband purchased me a bottle as an early Christmas present. The only size available was almost $92 + tax. Let me just say, it smells TOTALLY different than the sample in the store. If you like the smell of self tanner then you will love this. There was no self tanner smell from the sample. I really wish there would have been a sample or travel size available. I have read that maybe it's the ph interaction on my skin. So now I only spray it on my clothes. If it hadn't have been so expensive I would just toss it. No returns either.  Honest review is that if they would take out the note that smells like self tanner or nasty body odor, I'd be so much more happier and probably keep wearing this fragrance from now on. The other notes are like heaven and must be what the sample concentration smells like. If only...

A couple hours later at home I smelled it again and it became something totally different. Iu2019m obsessed with it. Wear it for awhile before you decide! Ordering it now!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I first sprayed this on it had a fake pear and industrial smell that was quite off-putting. I immediately tried to wash it off in the shower. That didn't totally work, but I was left with a much more pleasant scent, so I experimented with it again. The next day I applied the perfume, waited until the top notes had dissipated (20 minutes, then another 2 hours), and was left with a very nice sophisticated fragrance. It's not a youthful scent, but I don't find it to be an old lady scent either. It's more of a scent I'd associate with a successful, classy woman. It is appropriate for day or night, and the scent lasts for 12+ hours on skin and longer on fabric. I think the bottle design matches the essence of the fragrance well. I really wish there was a travel size of this because paying so much for a bottle I'll never be able to finish is a bit ridiculous.  Note: I received a sample as a gift-with-purchase.

reviews.review_title: Great blend of spicy, sweet, fruty & musky notes
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'm so glad I gave this perfume a try. I'm absolutely in love with this scent. At the opening, I mainly get the scent of a crisp, fresh and juicy pair. Then it starts to get warm and spicy, and then it turns into a musky, sweet woody scent. This perfume keeps evolving during the day and it gets better and better. It's a clean scent, not thick and creamy, like a skin scent.  I can smell this on me for over 12 hrs from initial spray, without reapplying. The fruity, floral, spicy, warm, sweet, musky and woody notes are blended so well that one note doesn't seem to overpower another, at least not to me. It does seem like a mature scent and I think people thirty years of age, and over, may truly appreciate it. I would also categorize this as a unisex perfume, though it definitely leans more feminine.

reviews.review_title: Not worth it .. I will stay w my wholly grails

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After reading these reviews I just had to make one of my own. The 1 star reviews are blowing my mind. I am an average consumer and lover of Merit, as an almost 40 year old woman I GET the Merit esthetic. This perfume is a good representation of the brand, sophisticated, geared towards a more mature individual, someone who appreciates simple but essential  products, that just deliver. This perfume opens with a clean pear scent that could be done badly, but this smells like what you would imagine the JUICIEST pear you have ever smelled to be. The dry down is a clean, light, skin musk. I find the older I get, my once beloved fragrances cause me headaches or an overwhelming pressure feeling in my sinus, this doesn't. It will be the scent I reach for when going to the office or on days I want to have an aura of fresh scent around me, that I catch a whiff of every now and then. It's very Merit, not overwhelming, but subtlety impacts and enhances the wearer. Hope that helps!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this after smelling it in store during the sale and I was pleasantly surprised. The oil elixir base adds depth and hooks into skin, fabric and hair well, so it lasts a long time, albeit it is not a punch in the face scent. It's soft and subtle.   I believe the negative reviews are coming from people used to what currently constitutes an IT fragrance: food smells so chemically charged that they make you smell like a cake all day. The Merit scent is classic. It's something you could see Elizabeth Taylor or Marilyn Monroe wearing. It's very Chanel No.5, classic scent-y, but the pear adds vibrance and a youthful, modern twist.  It's more something I could see the European market appreciating, not the Bath and Body Works crazy North American market. It's a refined smell and carries a quiet dignity but immortal aura. It smells expensive. I am a fan, but I'll agree, the price for 30mL is steep.

From 4-10 hrs it smells like an elevated warm skin scent. I've smelled similar, but this is definitely my favorite of the type. One thing I like about it is that because it's not too strong, it didn't give me a headache like a number of perfumes I've tried. Because my least favorite part is the middle, it's a perfume I'd put on in the morning and not reapply all day. Which is nice considering it's not one of the cheaper perfunes.

I ended up returning the unopened perfume the next day because as the tester spray settled on my skin over the next few hours, it smelled less and less complex and just overall very sweet. And then it reminded me way too much of Mugler Alien (purple bottle, very Jasmine forward), and somehow the way Glossier You smells on me after a couple hours - two perfumes I enjoy, except the Merit did NOT smell nearly as good in comparison to those two. I couldn't justify keeping this. I really felt this was not a unique perfume, and the cost *per ounce* is very high. I also think the 30% jasmine oil content could be potentially sensitizing or irritating to some people's skin over time, so I don't see that as an advantage. Still, if you like jasmine and you don't own any jasmine heavy perfumes and you don't mind the price, you might like this.

It has the exact DNA of Glossier You but smells more expensive and luxuirous with a a slight floral note and its softer. The vibe I get from this is expensive elegant clean girl. You will not regret this. Best perfume purchase I've made in years.

reviews.review_text: Ive been testing this perfume for a week and here are my honest comments from a girlie who is trying to find her grown up version of GLOSSIER YOU I came upon this perfume completely by chance. Went in to buy the foundation stick, Glossier You and ended up snagging the last perfume and RETURNED my Glossier You First spritz, PEAR, incredibly fresh and transeasonal. AMBROX - the most present scent in Glossier You  As it settles: Pear is COMPLETELY GONE --- which is really disappointing as it smells gorgeous, BUT the scent that settles is a little more musky, a little powdery, like soft, warm sensual skin that holds a touch of freshness, its BORDERING on granny, but a step below in a way that gives mysterious hot girl I reapplied this twice in one day which I felt had the best impact. I  would say it lasts all day if you only care for close contact scents, but I re-sprayed because I DID want it to linger a bit more. Price... going to see how this goes but Im worried down the road I wont be able to justify the cost -- mind you in transitioning from Glossier You, 100ml at a similar price, to this extract at 30ml.

This is an exquisite and absolutely one of the most appealing perfumes I've ever worn. It's warm and woody, but still light and very feminine. I know this is dramatic, but  Retrospect is the Chanel Number 5 for modern women with vintage taste.

For me, the pear notes are most prominent when first sprayed giving a sparkling and clean essence that reminds me of a pear cider. As time passes, I get more of the musk and some powdery notes. Usually Iu2019m not a fan of powdery notes but here it balances so well with the pear, I canu2019t even be mad at it. Retrospect lasts really well but wears very close to the skin so itu2019s really a fragrance for you and those you let get close enough to enjoy. It is a beautiful and sophisticated fragrance that Iu2019ve been enjoying wearing since I received it.

reviews.review_title: Lacks complexity for the price point

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I had SUCH high hopes for this after reading the description and countless reviews. The marketing team deserves it all because I WANTED this so badly but it did not live up to the hype. I bought this with my own money, hoping for a soft, clean feminine scent with a hint of that bright pear. I also loved hearing it compared to an older version of Glossier's You (and I admit, I can see how that makes sense in that it is a skin scent but more for 40-50's IMO). However, this is what it actually smells like:  My grandmother's bathroom counter and memory of sifting through her drawer of scarves as a kid. Or my mom's makeup bag, with loose powders, eye shadows, and tubes of lipstick that have been in there for a while.  The pear comes through for initial spray, as in literally before it even lands on your skin you can smell it but it disappears instantly. You're left with a really heavy powder scent with slight white florals. No fruit, no vanilla for me. Just powdery, slightly warm musk. It lasts about 8 hours and does travel through the room nicely so I'll give it points for longevity I guess. Also points for the gorgeous bottle which is heavy and feels luxurious. After everything, My mom (58yo) said smells like a doctors office, my three year old said smells bad, and my husband said nope.

reviews.review_text: Smells DIVINE!! I'll be wearing this for nights out. It has a sweet scent, but it's not overpowering. Truly recommend !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am in LOVE. Iu2019ve been trying to find a new scent for awhile that isnu2019t too fruity or sweet and also not too musky, This is a spiced smell with a hint of sweet at the end and itu2019s just clean and delicious smelling. I highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am very pleased with this new scent! I love the shape of the bottle and how it feels like it was molded to be held in your hand. The scent itself smells very clean, sophisticated and elevated. I feel luxurious wearing this and have been getting compliments on it! The scent is long-lasting, and a new staple for me. Love it!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is modern and refreshing. Itu2019s my new everyday perfume. Plus the bottle is gorgeous, so sculptural and beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The bottle of this perfume is so beautiful! I was so excited about trying this new fragrance, as Iu2019m a fan of Merit. The perfume doesnu2019t project at all nor last longer than an hour. Also, the initial scent is very sweet and bright but the dry-down is just a dull musk and mossu2026not flattering at all. Iu2019m a floral girl so this was a letdown and Iu2019ll be returning it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this scent. Itu2019s lovely. I will say itu2019s very similar to Glossiers u201cyouu201d Itu2019s a bit more sophisticated so maybe the mature older sister. The note profile is exactly the same but Retrospect has a few added notes it thiers.  Itu2019s a second like scent. I absolutely love it and  highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly, this perfume smells clean, like really minimalistic just like the brand, it makes me feel put together, I donu2019t know how to explain it but itu2019s a really characteristic scent and itu2019s just perfect for every day use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve finally found my signature scent with Merit Retrospect! This fragrance is the perfect blend of warmth and sophistication, with just a hint of something unexpected. Itu2019s not overpowering, but it lasts all day, evolving beautifully as it wears. Iu2019ve received so many compliments, and it feels unique compared to other perfumes. The bottle is also stunning and looks amazing on my vanity. Highly recommend for anyone looking to add a touch of luxury to their daily routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got my order a week ago, I wanted to wait before writing a review. This perfume smells amazing and last very long, I love the smells, very smooth. Came well packaged in a beautiful box, I love the bottle. Ladies itu2019s a most have

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First day I wore this at work and one of my customers stopped me and asked me what I was wearing. I love all sorts of Merit products and when I heard they came out with a perfume I got really excited.   Itu2019s a great fall and spring scent. Not too strong, but Iu2019ll reapply it at least once throughout the day. It has this warm and soft/clean undertone to it (on my skin). Very mature and classy  The packaging is quality and clean. The bottom is glass and the top is heavy, nothing cheap.  Price is on the pricey side, but so is the brand.

reviews.review_title: The best clean + fruity perfume ever!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this perfume! It has a very clean smell, like fresh out the shower with a hint of fruit! It truly last all day and grows the longer you wear it. Canu2019t recommend this perfume enough for any age!

reviews.review_title: Nostalgic Sweetness Awaits with this Scent
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Packaging is absolutely pristine! Love the way this looks on my vanity and how well it fits in my palm - truly stands out in the fragrance line-ups. That being said, the scent is not quite what I lean towards (I typically gravitate towards woodsy / musky scents). The pear is a prominent scent with subtle notes of vanilla sweetness. There's something about it that reminds me of childhood scents - while I love the olfactory experience, it's not a scent I would wear in my day to day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lover of all things Merit and this perfume is no exception! It is the perfect mix of musky and feminine, making it the ideal fall transitional scent. Packaging is stunning. Long-lasting and the scent gets even better with wear and time.

reviews.review_title: Didnu2019t live up to the hype
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Packaging is stunning. Quality materials , ergonomically fits in the palm of your hand which creates a comforting and luxurious take on the ritual of spraying perfume. However, I wish the scent in the bottle matched that feel. There is a sharp note that kept throwing me off and left me confused each inhale. I tried to convince myself to like it among the other notes. I want to breathe and exhale deeply into a fragrance , pleasantly enjoy all that it is. Itu2019s unique but definitely not for me. Though I like the nostalgic scent of crayons Iu2019d rather not bathe in the scent all day. Itu2019s started to turn my stomach as the day went on. Retrospect did not evoke any sort of fantasy for me at first sniff.

reviews.review_title: Finally a natural perfume that lasts ALL DAY
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The smell is so lovely and fresh AND I was still smelling it even after a long day at work. This bottle will last me forever just bc I donu2019t have to apply it so often! Love

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A scent with personality. Fresh at first, then you get that musky, vanilla, amber scent. You can totally tell it's formulated to last, and therefore feels like a really different experience from other fragrances. And the bottle.. absolutely beautiful! I get so many compliments every time I wear this! Obsessed!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: For starters the packaging of this perfume is so beautiful and slick! The smell is a clean and fresh smell and you will smell so expensive! It lasts all day too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am usually a fan of muskier vetiver type scents. This scent has that spicy quality to it with an elevated floral fruit layer. I really love it. I know I wasnu2019t paid for it so the person who said it smells like crayons is probably on their own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Merit hit the mark spot on with this perfume. It smells warm and gives a rich and luxurious feeling. The lasting power of this perfume is also incredible, hours and hours later I still smell like it. I see myself making this my signature fragrance as it gives me confidence but also makes my heart skip a beat each time I smell it.

reviews.review_title: Love the bottle, but the fragrance doesn't work fo
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the bottle, but the fragrance doesn't work for me.   I like how the fragrance smells in the bottle, but after spraying it, it makes me kinda nauseous. I think its a mix of too many scents in one. The pear is overpowering in a bad way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: OMG,I just received my bottle of is perfume and I can't get enough of it. It smells so good, I love it.
Iu2019ve used this several times and love it! I get compliments on it too which is the best feeling. It is fairly neutral so I think it would compliment a lot of other scents too if you like to layer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The smell is like nothing I've ever experienced and it lasts ALL DAY. the package is a piece of art.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Retrospect is an incredibly refined fragrance, one that effortlessly takes me back to my childhood, evoking the warmth and comfort of my momu2019s 90s signature scent. Itu2019s nostalgic yet modern, with each spritz lingering beautifully on my skin, evolving throughout the day into a soft, personalized blend that feels unique to me. What I love most is how subtle yet long-lasting it isu2014it doesnu2019t overwhelm, but it sticks with you. My husband is absolutely captivated whenever I wear it, and I can feel his admiration every time. Itu2019s truly a scent that stays with you, in every way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A scent with personality. Fresh at first, then you get the musk, vanilla, amber. You can tell it's formulated to last, and therefore feels like a really different experience from other fragrances. And the bottle, come on!!! It's gorgeous! Not at all surprised that Merit nailed it in their first foray into this new space.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely stunning scent. Iu2019m very picky with my scents and tend to stick my one go to. This one is so fresh and perfect for every day. Something about feels nostalgic! Love love love.

reviews.review_title: A little goes a long way.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The bottle is so sleek and small it doesn't take up too much space. I personally love vanilla scented perfume so this one was new to me. While it does have a strong cologne type smell I have noticed that a little goes a long way. I have definitely used this product on special occasions and have gotten nothing but compliments on it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: y'all ready for a non-incentivized review from someone that purchased this with their own funds?  it smells like crayons and dishsoap. lasting power is extreme, but that's not a good thing when I smell like dollar store birthday candles, newsprint, and powder detergent. waxy, papery, and astringent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was a little hesitant buying this because of the vintage comments and the rose note that I usually don't love. This fragrance completely surprised me! It smells like a mix of Glossier You and Le Labo Another 13, but with more character. It definitely gives a vintage vibe but in the best way possible. It smells clean, while still being warm and inviting. It feels like a very timeless scent that I can continue to wear as I get older, which I love! I feel like it's not as strong as some of the other comments make it out to be, but it does last nicely throughout the day. If you love You & Another 13 you will definitely like this perfume! Already wishing it came in a larger size!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been trying out Meritu2019s Retrospect and Iu2019m obsessed! The scent is so uniqueu2014modern yet nostalgic at the same time. It starts with these subtle, soft notes then settles into something warmer and more comforting with hints of vanilla and musk. The bottle is stunning too. If youu2019re into clean, long-lasting fragrances, Retrospect is definitely worth trying!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is not a mind blowing fragrance but it's very beautiful. It's simple, not overpowering and is suitable for everyday, every occasion wear. If you want something subtle that won't be 'too much' this is a nice option.

reviews.review_title: Honest review from a fragrance collector
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: 100 dollars for 1oz is absolutely ridiculous. It's nothing groundbreaking or new.  Once you smell it 3 other perfumes come to mind.  Victoria Secret quality but with a high end price.

reviews.review_title: smells like an expensive doctors office

reviews.review_text: this goes so crazy. lovely scent, wears pretty decent for me personally. reminds me a lot of glossier you, which i could never wear since it smelled like cigarettes on me. this is definitely a bit brighter and uplifting. despite that, it seems to wear out into a super comfortably clean and musky smell. very impressed with just having played around for a few days

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a unique scent! Itu2019s a clean scent but also very warm and sexy. This perfume is long lasting. I received so many compliments on this :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The scent to the Merit Retrospect Lu2019Extrait de Parfum has been a refreshing rotation in my collection! The notes I get from the perfume is like a musky rose scent that develops throughout the day. I love the wear time on this bottle and love the uniqueness of the bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely LOVE this scent! It's one that gets notice from others but isn't too heavy! So perfect for a day-to-night scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The perfume has such a classic smell. Itu2019s not overwhelming, it is just the perfect about of scent for the every day simplistic woman. The packaging is everything. Merit always knows how to make you feel so special with every purchase. Absolutely love the scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the best secants out there it last all day and makes people stop and ask you what you are wearing on top of that the bottle is so goodQ

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the bottle shape and style - will definitely be using it as decor. I like how the scent is sweet, but not too powerful! It's a nice light sweet scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume reminds me of Glossier's You perfume but more matured. Packaging is beautiful too! It's just a little too sweet for my personal preference but it's still a pretty scent. Would say it's more of a skin scent as opposed to a fragrance that really projects.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Retrospect by Merit is a very nice, clean, standard kind of perfume. The packaging and marketing is absolutely beautiful and would be a good gift. The vintage element comes through with the florals but smells similar to the perfume my grandma would wear... After a few hours, you are left mostly with the musk/amber notes. Overall, not offensive and pleasant.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love the scent, definitely matches up with what I generally wear for my perfumes!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Price point is amazing for the luxurious quality of this perfume. It has warm tones that are perfect for fall/winter and its initial scent compared to the way it wears just gets better and better the more you go through your day. It integrates so nicely, and I am blown away by this perfume launch.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think this is one of the first non-incentivized reviews, and I'll be super honest. First off, I love most things Merit. Love their makeup and their skincare and so I had really high hopes for their first fragrance. I'm hugely disappointed. The scent isn't terrible, but it's nothing new and it really does smell old fashioned, but not in the good, retro kind of way they were aiming for. It really just smells like an old, out-of-fashion perfume, and smells weirdly stale on me. Again, it's not horrific, but this would not be something I'd be tempted to reach for, I just think there are so many nicer everyday type of skin scents out there to choose from. For the size and the price point I just don't think it's worth it. Maybe I'm in the minority on this, or maybe the honest reviews haven't started flowing yet, but I would just say to smell it before you buy it. I gave two stars because if you do happen to like it, the longevity is amazing! I scrubbed and scrubbed and could not get it off. Also the packaging is beautiful, like everything Merit. Overall though, this is a rare miss from them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is amazing!!! The product lasted for multiple hours after the initial application. Iu2019m loving it! Great for any setting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This smells so nice! Of course you need to be more into warm/masculine type of scents but for me it's perrrff

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for a new date night perfume and this is soo good! Itu2019s a cozy fall/winter scent. It lasted so long on me and got many compliments

At first, I was a little apprehensive because it gives off quite a sweetness as you put it on, but I feel it turned into more of a natural scent throughout the day that wasn't too identifiable, which is what I love in a fragrance. I don't like fragrance to be too fussy, so I will definitely be using this and mixing with my other fragrances! :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

The wear time is great, I can smell it in my hair hours later. The cap can be a little tough to get off but I love how durable the bottle is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this product. The fragrance is strong but soft, perfect for a causal everyday wear or apply a bit more than usual for a powerful evening presence. I LOVE the bottle and packaging - makes it feel luxurious.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Everything I needed for fall. Iu2019m obsessed with how how it smells so clean and feels so elegant. Iu2019ve already gotten so many compliments on how I smell while wearing it! reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m very picky with the perfume I wear. Love merit and decide to give this a try. Love the smell. Iu2019d say itu2019s kinda similar to glossier you ( the old version ). Perfect for fall. Would wear this everyday.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My first thought about this perfume was that it reminds of walking through the perfume section of a department store in the '90s. It is overpowering and definitely has the vintage quality mentioned, but I didn't really note anything modern about it. This just isn't for me.

reviews.review_title: From the 9-to-5 to espresso martinis at happy hou
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this fragrance! Since the day it came in the mail, I knew it was going to be a  great everyday scent for me but I did test it out for a full week just to be sure. Its very fresh and clean, but also musky in a way. There's some citrusy notes in there as well but overall it's a very versatile scent. It also doesn't have all of those yucky chemicals so if you suffer from headaches or nausea with fragrances, you'll be good with this one. From the 9-to-5 to espresso martinis at happy hour - this is the perfect day-to-night scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am absolutely in love with this scent for fall and winter. Not only is the bottle a work of art and looks amazing sitting on a counter as decor, but the fragrance is amazing too. You can control how strong you want the scent to be with how many spritz you do and no matter how many spritz the fragrance will last all day! This is the quintessential fall sophisticated and sexy fragrance of the season! I also love the size of the bottle and how perfectly it fits inside of a bag for a night out. It also has a perfect little thumb indent for easy one handed spritzing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This isn't my typical style of fragrance, but I really enjoy how this smells. It feels very luxurious and it lasts all day. A little bit goes a long way, so I can see this lasting a while. I also love the packaging!

reviews.review_title: A must have fragrance for the fall!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am loving this new warm & spicy fragrance! Itu2019s very long lasting and has the most beautiful blend of bergamot, and jasmine with a musky base. Itu2019s a sweet but mature scent that I get so many compliments on every time I wear it. I also love how it pairs with vanilla fragrances. Itu2019s definitely a must have scent for the fall!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this fragrance myself during the app's early access. I was attracted to the beautiful bottle and was excited to see that one of the notes listed was an ambrette, one of my favorites. The composition seemed familiar, and I expected it to be something I had smelled before and liked, so I ordered the perfume. It arrived, and I found the bottle very pretty but small, at only 1 ounce. I had difficulty opening the cap as it was a little awkward. I sprayed it once, and the atomizer worked nicely. The scent is very similar to Diptyque Fleur de Peau EDP. I would even consider it a dupe. This perfume gives a pleasant scent bubble (people will smell you at arm's length). Longevity is strong; this will last you all day, nose to skin 8+

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you're looking for a long lasting perfume that will stay out all day long, and even beyond, that's the one. The scent is luxurious, high end. I myself tend to prefer simpler scent profiles with vanilla and amber notes, so this is more sophisticated, for sure. But it's a good one to have  if you want to make an impression, a good one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin

It's very mature and almost powder-y on me. I love the scent right out of the bottle though so wondering if it's just my skin PH. Also wish the staying power lasted. I don't smell it on my clothes or skin after about an hour. Had so much excitement for this but didn't really hit the mark for me sadly!

reviews.review_title: Everyoneu2019s Been Asking About My Scent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to finally try this and it lived up to the hype! Retrospect is a warm, cozy scent thatu2019s perfect for the Fall and Winter. Iu2019ve gotten so many compliments when wearing already!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how unique this perfume is! Itu2019s perfect for fall. Iu2019ve worn it out a few times now and have received multiple compliments each time! Highly recommended!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfumes smells so elegant and cozy all at the same time! Obsessed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells absolutely amazing. It has quickly become one of my new every day favorites. So excited to continue to use this new product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is so delicately sophisticated with how clean yet warm it wears and I've noticed it lasts throughout my entire work days! Also the packaging could notttt be more stunning. A fragrance collection must-have!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells so good! I tested it out for a week and the smell does not fade throughout the day. I was complimented multiples times. I feel as though it makes you smells fresh, I love it and highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This smells so clean yet so sophisticated Iu2019m definitely making this my new top scent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this perfume. Smells very nastolgic and clean. Itu2019s perfect for an everyday scent and I love that it smells slightly different on everyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was in love with this scent the moment I sprayed it on. It's so sophisticated and gives me it girl vibes. It gives me a confidence boost so this is now my new go-to scent!

reviews.review_title: This perfume makes me feel confident!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells amazing! I feel so good wearing this out and lasts all night! Highly recommend for someone who needs a new perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I usually lean more toward mature, clean scents and my goodness this one is goooood!!! It smells clean and floral with a hint of sexy spice! I can see myself wearing this out to a date night or a drinks with friends! I think i have found my new signature scent!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This scent perfectly encompasses my age in my opinion. I feel confident wearing this out! I usually find scents I enjoy but are either too mature or young, too fruity or floral, or just too much musk or freshness.   I feel this has the right mixture of musk but still has fresh and fruity notes to keep it to the mid-late 20s. Its very elegant smelling as well, and the description is true to the scent.  If you are younger or older I think you would enjoy it as well due to it mixing differently with everyone's body chemistry. Definitely give it a try!  The scent was definitely a surprise and I'm glad I have this as its easily top 3 for me!  I will say as I do have arthritis, the bottle is a bit hard to get open. Otherwise its a very fun unboxing experience!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried MERIT's new fragrance, Retrospect, and I was impressed by its sophisticated blend of modern and vintage elements. The scent opens with fresh notes of bergamot and pear, which are brightened by aldehydes. As it evolves, the floral heart of jasmine, rose, and violet creates a beautifully balanced, elegant bouquet.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_text: Starting from the outside I really enjoyed the packaging of this perfume. Full glass bottle with a heavy lid that was easy to remove and easy to grip. The perfume itself leaves you with a clean scent and warm undertones making it perfect for fall. As I wore it throughout the day I found myself liking it more. It does last a good 8-12 hours without having to reapply. The scent does change a bit but I didnu2019t mind it like I said I enjoyed it more. Overall a really good fall perfume that I can see myself wearing this entire season.

Disclaimer: I received this perfume in exchange for an honest review.   Retrospect has definitely grown on me as I've worn it everyday since I received it. Upon spraying, the smell is quite strong, and what I would describe as floral and powdery. But that quickly goes away and once it dries down, I get a beautiful warm and slightly spicy scent that I really like. I personally do not pick up the fruity notes that are mentioned (bergamot/pear).  Overall, I am very pleased with this perfume! It is so timeless and addictive. Then that went away and it basically became a toned-down version of You (Glossier). I'm not getting any of the listed base notes. It was fun to smell how it changes over time. But nothing about it seems unique or a complement getter like other people are claiming. Bottle looks stunning though, like a curved version of Orabella. I'm already wondering what the flankers are going to smell like.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not usually big on perfume, but this one by MERIT is top notch. It's pleasant without being overpowering. It smells sweet, mature, and expensive, but not in a department-store kind of way. It makes me feel like a strong, yet soft and feminine woman.  I put a little bit on my wrists in the evening and it lasted until I washed it off before bed, so over 5 hours! I like that the smell doesn't change as you wear it throughout the day. If you've ever tried the Glossier you perfume, it almost reminds me of that but more mature, soft, and womanly. I prefer this Retrospect perfume over the Glossier one! I plan on wearing this every time I go out.  The bottle this perfume comes in is also one of my favorite parts about it. It's a very nice, smooth curved bottle that fits nicely in your hand, but has a flat bottom so you can put it on your vanity to be shown off. The gold accents are super pretty and the best materials. Doesn't feel cheap at all. This perfume is yet another product I've gotten from MERIT that shows their dedication to consistently super high-quality products that aren't just more junk in the market - but actually products you'll want to use and are 100% worth the money.  tl;dr - You really couldn't ask for a better date night perfume! Buy itttt, you won't regret it

It isn't peppery or light for summer months, at least personally not to me. The scent lingers on even after shower which I love! reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to see Merit launch a fragrance, I gasped when I opened the box! My first impression was how beautiful the packaging and bottle are, the perfume looks so chic on display or in your bag. The bottle fits nicely in your hand, the only downside is I could see the cap being hard to remove for individuals with hand mobility limitations. In a market saturated with new perfumes & skin scents, Retrospect sets itself apart from the rest. When I took my first sniff, I couldn't place what I was smelling - it was fresh, but enveloped in a buttery, powdery, cozy blanket. I definitely smell the bergamot and pear notes first, quickly followed by the ambertte and aldehydes. The floral middle notes aren't your traditional florals - the orris note mellows them out with its powdery scent. On my skin, the moss and musk notes stay the most prominent throughout the day, sweetened a little with vanilla, while still having a fresh, zingy undertone from the bergamot. This is a clean skin scent, but cozy clean not fresh out of the shower clean. It is PERFECT for fall & winter, and will transition beautifully into the warmer seasons. From a fragrance girly through and through, I am truly impressed. Bravo Merit!!!
